entities.name: imperius curse
entities.description: The Imperius Curse is a spell that can control someone's actions. It was used by Crouch to put Harry back under its effect.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is a house-elf who failed her master and let Harry acquire a wand.

entities.name: bertha jorkins
entities.description: Bertha Jorkins was an old woman who was captured by Voldemort's followers in Albania.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story. He had found out that Harry was still alive and sent his servant Wormtail to bring him back.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is Voldemort's servant who brought Crouch to their house.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school for young wizards and witches where Moody was going to teach.

entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: The Triwizard Tournament is an event that Bertha Jorkins told Voldemort about.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is an old Auror who was going to teach at Hogwarts.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is a person who was possessed by Voldemort and had his head roll on his neck.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist of the story who was put back under the Imperius Curse by Crouch.

entities.name: house-elf
entities.description: House-elves are a species of magical creatures that serve wizards and witches.

relationships.description: Voldemort had sent Wormtail to bring Crouch back.
Crouch was under the control of the Imperius Curse.
Bertha Jorkins was tortured by Voldemort's followers until she broke through the Memory Charm.
Winky had failed her master Crouch and let Harry acquire a wand.
